title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, November 1, 2020
description: On this day in 1993, the European Union was formally established, with 28 countries choosing to join it and open their borders to trade and travel.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this day in 1993, the European Union was formally established, with 28 countries choosing to join it and open their borders to trade and travel.
